name: sonic the hedgefrog
description:
OH NO! the frog broke his legs again. he just rolls around and sticks his tongue out and that somehow allows him to clip through walls. he cant even jump lmao.

left and right arrow keys to move, use your momentum instead of jumping (hint). x to use tongue, tongue teleports you.
if you hit a fly with your tongue you gain health, if a fly hits you you lose health. GET TO THE TOP TO WIN :)

and yes, it is possible to beat, ive done it, just get good lol

see how fast you can win!

uses "Here we are" from undertale by tobyfox
uses random picture of swamp i found on google
